If you have an English and a German version of your content, the fields content_en and content_de will exist for the index document that is generated for the content and the fields will contain all the language specific values. For the example the fields will look like {language specific text} {int value for the date}{true or false, dependent on the content}, or, more specific, the English version may be my text 1234567890 false. Moreover, the content of the fields will be indexed for each container-page the content is placed on.
